How to play:

Play this free real snow drifting racer game and drifting on multiple snow and desert way to assembling and leave the mark on snow environment with your full spirits and passion.

Drift safely on track to avoid your sports car crash but don’t attempt real snow drifting racer , your car engine & transmission are full of power & energy so you will not be able to control it in real snow drifting racer, Be a real drifter and not a drag racer or Snow racer. Forward and reverse buttons are on the right bottom of the screen.
You can select tilting, steering or arrows to drive your car.
